Hi, 
Command that I am using to lauch Heritrix are as follows:
export HERIT=
RIX_HOME=3D/root/heritrix-1.14.3
cd $HERITRIX_HOME
$HERITRIX_HOME/bin/herit=
rix --admin=3DLOGIN:PASSWORD --port=3D9090

the URL that I use to to attemp=
t to access the administrative is:
http://localhost:9090

The IP of the PC =
that I installed with Heritrix is: 10.17.32.141 and my laptop IP is 10.17.3=
2.144, I cant use my laptop to remote access to the PC.

Can u pls advice a=
nd guide me on this? 

Thanks in advance,
Allen Wilson
